channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 16 Best Gifts for PC Gamers (2024): Headsets, Desks, Monitors
item.description: It’s dangerous to go alone! Take these headsets, keyboards, and mice and give them to your favorite PC gamer.

item.title: D-ID launches new high-quality avatars capable of real-time conversations

item.title: The 14 Best Office Chairs in 2024, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: Boston Dynamics’ Atlas humanoid hot dogs for the camera

item.title: 17 Best Horror Shows to Binge for Halloween
item.description: Whether you seek spooky chills, jump scares, or creeping dread, we have horror show recommendations to sate your thirst.

item.title: My Fanged Feline Loves This Spooky Cat Gear—Yours Will Too
item.description: This Gothic cat tree, ghostly drinking fountain, and spectral litter mat are purrfect for Halloween fans.

item.title: Technics SL-1200GS Review: A Bomb Proof Classic
